author: michael-pitt
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds additional pruning rules to prunedGenParticles gated by the `run3_upc` modifier used in HI UPC runs:
the following particles are retained in `prunedGenParticles` for very forward phase space (|| > 6.0):

* Neutrons (pdgId = 2112)
* Photons (pdgId = 22)
* K0L (pdgId = 130)

* Nuclear fragments / ions (abs(pdgId) >= 1e9)

The neutral particles are required for ZDC and FSC truth-level studies in Run 3. The change is strictly gated by the `run3_upc` modifier and therefore does not affect standard pp workflows or non-UPC production.

No changes to event content definitions outside the `run3_upc` context are introduced.

#### PR validation:

Validated with `CMSSW_15_1_X`, need to backport to `CMSSW_15_0_X`
title: Keep very forward neutrals and nuclear fragments in prunedGenParticle for HI UPC runs [backport to 15.1.X]
